issue.title: [C++] Gandiva build failure
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8871](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8871). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Looks like there was an undetected conflict between Gandiva changes to use the Arrow parsing internals, and the refactor of said parsing internals.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8871?focusedCommentId=17112012) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7232
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7232>
